Class AlertConfigNotificationDevices

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.AlertConfigNotificationDevices

  • public class AlertConfigNotificationDevices
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration data for all alert notification devices.
    See Also:
    AlertConfig
